full_summary:
### Tender Announcement #F7044-211183

#### Notice Details

* **Bid Name (Title)**: Inspection of Spare MIB Shaft
* **Publication Date**: August 24, 2022
* **Bid Closing Date**: September 8, 2022 (13:00:00 Hrs)
* **Business Type**: Bid Solicitation
* **Procedure**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Notice Description

The Public Works and Government Services Canada is soliciting bids from interested suppliers for the Inspection of a spare MIB Shaft.

**Trade Agreement**: This bid falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contract Location**: The contract will be administered by the Public Works and Government Services Canada in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Delivery Date**: The proposed contract is expected to be completed within 18 weeks following contract award.

**Class of Supply**: Ship and Boat Propulsion Components - Repair (GGenesis Code: JX2010).

**End-User Entity**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Quentin Crocker
* **Phone Number**: (902) 478-8034
* **Fax Number**: (902) 496-5016
* **E-mail Address**: [quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Address**: 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, Nova Scotia, B3J 1T3

#### Tender Documents

All interested suppliers may obtain tender documents from the [Canada Buys website](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

The contract is expected to be awarded to the lowest bidder. Suppliers are invited to submit their bids electronically or by mail, to the contact address mentioned above. Suppliers are required to complete the entire Statement of Work within the specified timeframe.
